parameters.name: resourceTypeCode
parameters.description: The type of object being worked on

200.description: This API follows [Open API schema](https://spec.openapis.org/oas/v3.1.0#schema-object) of structure for response.

value.title: CRM FieldSchema of Contact
value.description: CRM Field Schema of resourceType Contact.

platform__contact_additional_salesperson.description: Identifiers for additional salespeople in the platform.
platform__contact_additional_salesperson.title: Additional Salesperson IDs

platform__contact_salesperson_id.description: Identifier for a salesperson in the platform.
platform__contact_salesperson_id.title: Salesperson ID

platform__ssc_contact_id.description: Identifies the SSC contact, which may be associated with zero or more account groups.
platform__ssc_contact_id.title: Platform SSC contact IDs

platform__user_id.description: Identifier for contact's underlying IAM user.
platform__user_id.title: Platform user ID

standard__contact_company_name.description: Name of the contact's company. This may be set independently from the name property on the contact's associated company.
standard__contact_company_name.title: Company name

standard__contact_company_website.description: Name of the contact's company website. This may be set independently from the name property on the contact's associated company.
standard__contact_company_website.title: Company website

standard__contact_lifecycle_stage.description: Lifecycle stage of the contact. E.g. 'Lead'
standard__contact_lifecycle_stage.title: Lifecycle stage

standard__contact_linkedin_url.description: URL of the contact's LinkedIn profile.
standard__contact_linkedin_url.title: LinkedIn URL

standard__contact_mobile_phone_number.description: Mobile phone number of the contact.
standard__contact_mobile_phone_number.title: Mobile phone number

standard__contact_next_task_due_date.description: Date indicating when the next task of the contact is due for completion
standard__contact_next_task_due_date.title: Next task due date

standard__contact_next_task_id.description: ID of the next task of the contact
standard__contact_next_task_id.title: Next task ID

standard__contact_primary_company_id.description: The primary company associated with the contact.
standard__contact_primary_company_id.title: Primary Company

standard__contact_primary_location_city_.description: City or locality of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_city_.title: City/locality

standard__contact_primary_location_count.description: Country of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_count.title: Country

standard__contact_primary_location_state.description: State, province, or region of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_state.title: State/province/region

standard__contact_primary_location_stree.description: Street address line 1 of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_stree.title: Street address line 1

standard__contact_primary_location_stree.description: Street address line 2 of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_stree.title: Street address line 2

standard__contact_primary_location_zip_p.description: Zip or postal code of the contact's primary location.
standard__contact_primary_location_zip_p.title: Zip/postal code

standard__contact_source_name.description: Name of the app or external system that created the contact. E.g. 'Salesforce', 'Hubspot', 'Gmail'
standard__contact_source_name.title: Source name

standard__contact_timezone.description: Timezone of the contact. This is a string representing the timezone like 'America/New_York'.
standard__contact_timezone.title: Timezone

standard__tags.description: Descriptive keywords that help you find and segment contacts.
standard__tags.title: Tags

system__contact_external_id.description: External identifier for the record, optional
system__contact_external_id.title: External ID

system__contact_group_id.description: Group ID for the record, optional. Used for grouping records together, and authorization where users are restricted to selected groups.
system__contact_group_id.title: Group ID

system__contact_last_activity_date.description: Date and time of last activity
system__contact_last_activity_date.title: Last activity date

system__contact_updated.description: When the record was last updated
system__contact_updated.title: Updated date

yesware__contact_enrichment_vendor_id.description: The ID of the enrichment vendor in Yesware. If the contact has not been enriched, this field will be unset.
yesware__contact_enrichment_vendor_id.title: Yesware enrichment vendor ID

yesware__contact_id.description: The ID of the contact in Yesware.
yesware__contact_id.title: Yesware contact ID

yesware__contact_last_enrichment_date.description: The date of the last enrichment in Yesware. If the contact has not been enriched, this field will be unset.
yesware__contact_last_enrichment_date.title: Yesware last enrichment date

get.description:
[Status](https://developers.vendasta.com/platform/ZG9jOjEwMTU2NTYy-versioning): `Proposed`

Retrieve field schema based on namespace.

parameters.name: resourceTypeCode
parameters.description: The type of object being worked on

200.description: The list of valid options for the field. This can be used to create a dropdown list for your users.

name.description: The text to be displayed to users. Note this might be translated.

value.description: The value to be saved in the database

get.description:
[Status](https://developers.vendasta.com/platform/ZG9jOjEwMTU2NTYy-versioning): `Proposed`

Retrieve the field options based on the given fieldId.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filtering is an OPTIONAL parameter. It filters field option based on given filter value.

parameters.name: paging
parameters.description: Pagination to retrieve a specific page of results

parameters.name: resourceTypeCode
parameters.description: The type of object being worked on

patch.description:
[Status](https://developers.vendasta.com/platform/ZG9jOjEwMTU2NTYy-versioning): `Proposed`

Create/update CRM contacts, companies or activities records.

Default rules will be used to match existing records. You may specificy your own fields that contain unique values in `searchExisting`.

If a match is found the records will be merged using the always_overwrite, overwrite_if_empty, overwrite_if_newer & combine stratagy

returnFields.description: A list of fields that should have their merged values returned in the response. If empty no fields will be returned.

post.description:
[Status](https://developers.vendasta.com/platform/ZG9jOjEwMTU2NTYy-versioning): `Proposed`

Create a new CRM record. 
Tip: Use Upsert CRM Record to automatically check for existing records to merge the provided data into.

CRMActivity.description: The CRM Activity Field Schema combines the fields from all of the activity sub types

standard__activity_call_body.description: Description of the call, including any notes that you want to add. Or even a transcript.
standard__activity_call_body.title: Call body

standard__activity_call_date.description: Date and time the call was made.
standard__activity_call_date.title: Call date

standard__activity_call_direction.description: Direction of the call, e.g.: INBOUND, OUTBOUND, etc…
standard__activity_call_direction.title: Call direction

standard__activity_call_duration.description: Duration of the call in milliseconds.
standard__activity_call_duration.title: Call duration

standard__activity_call_outcome.description: Outcome of the call, e.g.: BUSY, CONNECTED, LEFT_LIVE_MESSAGE, LEFT_VOICE_MESSAGE, NO_ANSWER, WRONG_NUMBER, etc…
standard__activity_call_outcome.title: Call outcome

standard__activity_call_status.description: Technical status of the call, e.g.: SCHEDULED, BUSY, CALLING, CANCELLED, FAILED, IN_PROGRESS, NO_ANSWER, etc…
standard__activity_call_status.title: Call status

standard__activity_campaign_id.description: An optional ID for the campaign that the email is associated with
standard__activity_campaign_id.title: Campaign ID

standard__activity_communication_channel.description: Communication channels different than email, or a call, e.g.: SMS, VENDASTA_INBOX, WHATS_APP, LINKEDIN_MESSAGE, etc…
standard__activity_communication_channel.title: Communication channel

standard__activity_communication_date.description: Date and time the activity was made.
standard__activity_communication_date.title: Communication date

standard__activity_communication_directi.description: Direction of the communication activity, e.g.: INBOUND, OUTBOUND, etc…
standard__activity_communication_directi.title: Communication direction

standard__activity_communication_from_id.description: If the communication channel has an ID used for sending and receiving it can be recorded here.
standard__activity_communication_from_id.title: Communication from ID

standard__activity_communication_outcome.description: Outcome of the communication, e.g.: SCHEDULED, COMPLETED, RESCHEDULED, NO_SHOW, CANCELLED
standard__activity_communication_outcome.title: Communication outcome

standard__activity_communication_status.description: status of the communication, e.g.: DELIVERED, PROCESSED, BOUNCED
standard__activity_communication_status.title: Communication status

standard__activity_communication_to_id.description: If the communication channel has an ID used for sending and receiving it can be recorded here.
standard__activity_communication_to_id.title: Communication to ID

standard__activity_communication_type.description: Type of the communication, e.g: General, Campaign, Reputation review request
standard__activity_communication_type.title: Communication type

standard__activity_email_body.description: Text or HTML body of the email
standard__activity_email_body.title: Email body

standard__activity_email_date.description: Date and time the email was sent.
standard__activity_email_date.title: Email date

standard__activity_email_direction.description: The direction the email is going from/to, e.g.: SENT, INCOMING, FORWARDED, etc…
standard__activity_email_direction.title: Email direction

standard__activity_email_id.description: The ID is a consistent ID for an email across multiple status activities
standard__activity_email_id.title: Email ID

standard__activity_email_status.description: Status for the email delivery, e.g.: BOUNCED, FAILED, SCHEDULED, SENDING, SENT, etc…
standard__activity_email_status.title: Email status

standard__activity_email_subject.description: Subject line of the logged email.
standard__activity_email_subject.title: Email subject

standard__activity_email_type.description: The email type, e.g.: Marketing, Sales, etc…
standard__activity_email_type.title: Email type

standard__activity_manually_logged.description: Whether the activity was manually logged
standard__activity_manually_logged.title: Manually logged

standard__activity_meeting_analysis_proc.description: Processed transcript ID of the meeting analysis
standard__activity_meeting_analysis_proc.title: Meeting transcript ID

standard__activity_meeting_duration.description: Duration of the meeting in milliseconds.
standard__activity_meeting_duration.title: Meeting duration

standard__activity_meeting_internal_note.description: Internal notes you take for your team not included in the meeting description.
standard__activity_meeting_internal_note.title: Meeting internal notes

standard__activity_meeting_last_analyzed.description: Last analyzed by AI date of the meeting
standard__activity_meeting_last_analyzed.title: Meeting last analyzed date

standard__activity_meeting_location.description: Where the meeting takes place. The value could be a physical address, a conference room, a videoconference link, or a phone number.
standard__activity_meeting_location.title: Meeting location

standard__activity_meeting_outcome.description: Outcome of the meeting, e.g.: SCHEDULED, COMPLETED, RESCHEDULED, NO_SHOW, CANCELLED
standard__activity_meeting_outcome.title: Meeting outcome

standard__activity_meeting_status.description: Meeting status ex. SCHEDULED, COMPLETED, RESCHEDULED, etc.
standard__activity_meeting_status.title: Meeting status

standard__activity_meeting_summary_body.description: Body of the summary of the meeting
standard__activity_meeting_summary_body.title: Meeting summary body

standard__activity_meeting_summary_title.description: Title of the summary of the meeting
standard__activity_meeting_summary_title.title: Meeting summary title

standard__activity_meeting_url.description: Link to a calendar, for example Google Calendar, Calendar Hero, etc.
standard__activity_meeting_url.title: Meeting URL

standard__activity_name.description: Display name used when showing a summary of the activity.
standard__activity_name.title: Name

standard__activity_opportunity_change_id.description: The unique identifier for an Opportunity
standard__activity_opportunity_change_id.title: Opportunity ID

standard__activity_opportunity_change_la.description: The ID of the salesperson who last edited the Opportunity
standard__activity_opportunity_change_la.title: Last edit salesperson ID

standard__activity_opportunity_change_lo.description: Explanation of why the Opportunity was lost
standard__activity_opportunity_change_lo.title: Lost reason

standard__activity_opportunity_change_pi.description: The pipeline status of the Opportunity in the pipeline, (closed-won, closed-lost, open, etc)
standard__activity_opportunity_change_pi.title: Pipeline stage

standard__activity_opportunity_change_up.description: The date the Opportunity was last updated
standard__activity_opportunity_change_up.title: Updated date

standard__activity_record_change_field_i.title: List of the Field ID's for the fields changed

standard__activity_record_change_referen.description: The ChangeID that references the change
standard__activity_record_change_referen.title: Record change reference ID

standard__activity_record_change_type.description: The type of change associated with a CRM object record, e.g.: CREATED, CHANGED_TO, etc…
standard__activity_record_change_type.title: Record change type

standard__activity_record_change_user_id.title: ID of the person who made the change

standard__activity_source_name.description: Name of the app or external system that created the activity. E.g. 'Salesforce', 'Hubspot', 'Gmail'
standard__activity_source_name.title: Record source

standard__activity_tags.description: List of tags useful for segmentation of activities.
standard__activity_tags.title: Tags

standard__activity_task_due_date.description: Optional date indicating when the task is due for completion
standard__activity_task_due_date.title: Task due date

standard__activity_task_is_overdue.description: Indicates if the task was not completed before the due date
standard__activity_task_is_overdue.title: Task is overdue

standard__activity_task_priority.description: Priority for a given task, e.g.: HIGH, MEDIUM, LOW, etc…
standard__activity_task_priority.title: Task priority

standard__activity_task_status.description: Status for a given task, e.g.: COMPLETED, NOT_STARTED, IN_PROGRESS, etc…
standard__activity_task_status.title: Task status

standard__activity_task_type.description: Type of task to be executed, e.g.: EMAIL, CALL, TODO, etc…
standard__activity_task_type.title: Task type

standard__activity_url.description: Link to more information about the activity.
standard__activity_url.title: URL

standard__activity_url_name.description: Name of the link to more information about the activity.
standard__activity_url_name.title: URL name

system__activity_external_id.description: External identifier for the record, optional
system__activity_external_id.title: External ID

system__activity_updated.description: When the record was last updated
system__activity_updated.title: Updated date
